pages.text: The Path of Resonance is the path of the conjurer. All of your spells have a chance to duplicate. Summon powerful creatures, gain insights beyond your wildest dreams, vibrate your opponents skulls right out of their heads!$(br2)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_resonance_routes)Routes on the Path of Resonance$(/l)

pages.mods: Possible unique modifiers: Echoing, Masterful, Summoners Aspect, Insightful
